lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse has appointed Myo Schollum to head up its prime services coverage in Japan, as the bank endeavors to expand its business catering to hedge funds.
snippet: Credit Suisse has appointed Myo Schollum to head up its prime services coverage in Japan as the bank endeavors to expand its business catering to hedge funds.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Bolsters Prime Services Coverage

abstract: Credit Suisse has appointed Myo Schollum to head up its prime services coverage in Japan as the bank endeavors to expand its business catering to hedge funds.
